intro: Lenda, commonly known as the sacred lotus, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Asia. It belongs to the Nelumbonaceae family and is characterized by its large, showy flowers and broad, heart-shaped leaves. The plant thrives in shallow freshwater habitats, such as ponds and lakes.
